attributes.action: DONT LET AI TAKE OVER OUR JOBS!!
attributes.additional_details: Us public need to be able to afford our taxes / rent, food ect and we need to be able to have a structure in our life’s. There’s gonna be a loss of skill if AI takes over. AI is NEVER gonna be as better as us humans.
attributes.background: Us public want too be able to keep our jobs, and educate ourselves. Without a job there’s no money? WE DONT WANT AI TAKING OVER OUR JOBS!!!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Review how to protect jobs from being taken by AI technology
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707509

Make AI job replacement illegal
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/753745
